FuncDef: This command binds the advertisements received with the route target (RT) that matches the configured list (either the generic or the specified import) to a specific pw-template. If the RT list is not present the pw-template is used for all of them.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an existing policy ID. Values-1 to 2147483647.
The specified group-name overrides the split horizon group template settings.

Specifies communities allowed to be accepted from remote PE neighbors. An extended BGP community in the type:x:y format. The value x can be an integer or IP address. The type can be the target or origin. x and y are 16-bit integers. Values-target:{ip-addr:comm-val| 2byte-asnumber:ext-comm-val|4byte-asnumber:comm-val}.
